models.map

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • models.map.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.util.Observable
    This class is the model for map. It defines the basic information and behaviors of a map, and it is observed by MapEditorView.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Xinyan, Parisa, Lin
    See Also:
    MapEditorView

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Map()
      Constructor to create a map It initializes the basic information of a map

      • updateContinentByID

        public void updateContinentByID(int continentID,
                                java.lang.String name,
                                int value)
        Update a continent's name and value in this map. In addition, notify the MapEditorView that the map has been changed.
        Parameters:
        continentID - The id of the continent which is to be updated
        name - The new name of the continent
        value - The new value of the continent

      • updateCountryByID

        public void updateCountryByID(int countryID,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String continentName)
        Update a country's name and continent which the country belongs to in this map. In addition, notify the MapEditorView that the map has been changed.
        Parameters:
        countryID - The id of the country which is to be updated
        name - The new name of the country
        continentName - The new continent's name which the country belongs to

        Get the number of countries in this map
        Returns:
        The number of countries in this map

      • removeContinentByID

        public void removeContinentByID(int id)
        Remove a continent from the map, and also remove all countries belong to this continent. In addition, notify the MapEditorView that the map has been changed.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the continent to be removed

      • removeCountryByID

        public void removeCountryByID(int id)
        Remove a country from the map, and also remove all connection relationships of this country. In addition, notify the MapEditorView that the map has been changed.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the country to be removed

      • addConnection

        public void addConnection(int countryID1,
                          int countryID2)
        Add a connection between two countries. In addition, notify the MapEditorView that the map has been changed.
        Parameters:
        countryID1 - The id of the first country
        countryID2 - The id of the second country

        countryID2 - The id of the second country

        Parameters:

        id - The continent's id
        Returns:
        True if there is a duplicate name, false if there is no duplicate name
